title: Ai You Hei Pi
synopsis: "Ayyoza" is an 8-year-old second-grade student in elementary school. He is a lively and mischievous but kind-hearted child. Although he often causes trouble for classmates and teachers because of mischief, he is very popular with his friends. "Black Skin" is a Boston Terrier with upright personality, smart, agile, loyal and confident, and a sense of justice. Black Skin and Ouch are very good friends. Together, they fight Bond who dreams of making a fortune all day. Doctor. This is an animated world that gathers joy, wit, magic, fun and moving. (translated from iqiyi)
